H0.text: What is the only country in which the Komodo Dragon is found in the wild. Malaysia

H1.text: What is the only country in which the Komodo Dragon is found in the wild. Philippines

H2.text: What is the only country in which the Komodo Dragon is found in the wild. Thailand

H3.text: What is the only country in which the Komodo Dragon is found in the wild. INDONESIA

A4.text: The Komodo dragon is endemic to the Indonesian islands of Komodo, Rinca, Flores, Gili Dasami, and Gili Motang.
